name: #planting_in_progress
description:
#planting_in_progress

#planting_in_progress is a game made for Pride Game Jam HKI 2021. It's a puzzle card game about growing plants in the garden and figuring out how they get along making your own rainbow road.

Programming/Sound (Construct3/Audacity) : taikametsä
3D art (Blender) : emissart
Pixel assets (GraphicsGale) : voxune

This is an image with the text planting in progress.
There are six diagonal pride colours behind the text and a little pixel art mouse with leaves for dots.
